title: Dji Mavic 2
description: The Mavic 2 is DJI's flagship consumer drone built for pros and enthusiasts. The Mavic 2 Pro offers a Hasselblad camera with a 1-inch sensor, while the Mavic 2 Zoom has a 1/2.3-inch 12 MP sensor with two-times optical zoom. Both offer 31 minutes of flight, 8 km transmission, and omnidirectional obstacle sensing. Learn more at DJI.com.
